Body: SCR Tokens Available on OpenLedger DEX    As the Scorum Crowdsale enters its last week, our partnership with OpenLedger opens a new door for cryptocurrency enthusiasts who would like to purchase SCR tokens. We’re glad to announce that 1 million SCR tokens is set aside for purchase on the OpenLedger exchange as open.SCR tokens here starting February 2.  These SCR tokens are reserved from the 18.6 million tokens available during the Scorum Crowdsale.  This is the first step towards open market trading for SCR and offers current OpenLedger DEX users along with the wider BitShares community the chance to add increased liquidity to the SCR cryptocurrency.  Until the crowdsale ends on February 11th at 17:00 GMT, SCR tokens will be available on the OpenLedger decentralized exchange as open.SCR. This first version of open.SCR will have its value pegged at 1 USD until the end of the crowdsale and will guarantee the wallet holder receives open.SCR tokens of an equal amount when the Scorum blockchain is launched.  Open.SCR will be paired with bit.USD so that the community of traders on BitShares decentralized exchange can easily purchase SCR tokens without registering on the Scorum Crowdsale website. Along with further visibility, this offers SCR buyers a chance to purchase SCR in cryptocurrencies other than bitcoin and ethereum.  After the Scorum blockchain and wallet are launched in March. Open.SCR holders who wish to redeem their open.SCR for SCR tokens will send their open.SCR to OpenLedger accounts with their Scorum Wallet address. OpenLedger will then send them the same amount of SCR to their Scorum wallet.  Fans of Scorum who have joined the Scorum crowdsale already will be able to generate the private keys to their Scorum wallet and transfer the SCR tokens to OpenLedger and trade open.SCR in their wallet once the Scorum Blockchain and Wallet are launched. Once there, they can participate in buying further open.SCR or filling orders for open.SCR from other users on the exchange. After the end of the crowdsale, open.SCR will no longer be pegged at 1 USD and the open market will dictate the value of SCR tokens.  https://medium.com/@scorum/scr-tokens-available-on-openledger-dex-942c3940dd8d

For me our core function will be the blogging platform because I enjoy writing and reading about sports. Title: [ANN] [ICO] [SCR] SCORUM | ⭐ ⚽ ⭐ ⚾️ THE FIRST SPORTS MEDIA POWERED BY BLOCKCHAIN
Body: Scorum's revenue will be generated from three sources:  1. Advertising and article promotion within the blogging platform. Authors will be able to promote their posts at a nominal rate of .01 SCR per click which is significantly lower than other CPC ad costs. This advertising will be purchased in SCR and the revenue from ads will be split according to this framework:    2. Scorum will welcome partners to sell their sports goods or services within the platform. As the user audience grows, this will be more and more favorable for other businesses within the sports industry. Paired with the blogging platform where athlete representatives can promote the goods of their sponsors and the utility to pay for goods and services with SCR accumulated in user's accounts, the partner programs will give Scorum members an easy and efficient means to spend SCR without needing to exchange it externally.  3. The photo database will offer sports photographers a place to showcase their work and offer high-resolution images for sale to sports fans around the world. From this, Scorum will collect 10% while the author will get 80% and the final 10% goes into the reward pool for active photographers.  With these three revenue streams designed to both sustain Scorum and reward the community for its activity within the platform, we won't need to charge fees for other popular services such as daily fantasy sports or the betting exchange. These commission free services will naturally expand the audience of sports fans interested in utilizing SCR within the platform.

Author: John_Mct
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [SCR] SCORUM | ⭐ ⚽ ⭐ ⚾️ THE FIRST SPORTS MEDIA POWERED BY BLOCKCHAIN
Body: It truly is hard to predict at this point. One of the dynamics I've noticed while using Steemit is that an initial "buy-in" to boost your posts can lead to more visibility in your posts and therefore a higher reward pay-out for the author and commenters/curators. Even among the most die-hard sports fans, the amount of money they spend on sports-related purchases varies widely. What we're presenting is the chance gain value (in SCR and SP) for engaging in the active sports community.  For some, that may mean writing and publishing sports coverage and building a loyal reader audience. For others, it will mean winning big in fantasy sports or placing wagers. Remember, we're focused on the merits of decentralized economy so it will be up to the individual users to utilize SCR and the Scorum platform in ways that enrich their fan experience through their own efforts. To focus wholly on the utility of SCR, we're including parts of the platform where fans can spend their accumulated SCR on sports-related purchases like live streams or tickets to events or even sports merchandise.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] [SCR] SCORUM | ⭐ ⚽ ⭐ ⚾️ THE FIRST SPORTS MEDIA POWERED BY BLOCKCHAIN
Body: We've built the blogging platform with a few safeguards against manipulation: - To prevent spammy up-voting, users have a set Voting Power that is tied to their Scorum Power token account. This VP is spent 5% at a time on each upvote and is replenished back to full over a five day rolling timeframe. If you upvote everything and anything, your votes will have less and less power. - Rewards for a given post will be shared among the author, commenters, and upvoters. The more engagement with a post, the more rewards get distributed among users involved. This is weighted towards those who vote or comment earlier, so it is users best interest to find the latest high-quality content and upvote or comment on publications that will be popular with the most amount of users. In this way, the reward system is highly self-moderating. - To protect against "immediate" upvoting, there is a 30 minute window after publication where a higher percentage of the rewards go to the author, diminishing from 100% during the first minute down to the standard rate at minute 30. - Publications are only active in the reward pools for 7 days after the first upvote, after which they will be archived and removed from the reward system but still readable. - The content users see will be heavily self-selected as they follow certain authors or topics. Low quality content will get fewer rewards and therefore not be seen as "trending" within a given topic.

Body: Quote from: GoBelle on November 15, 2017, 08:58:44 PM I am interested in the concept, how do you plan to market it?  Marketing blockchain-based products with crowdsale funded projects is an ever evolving field.  To start with, of course, we're targeting our marketing campaign to crypto-enthusiasts who are more likely to participate in our crowdsale than the average sports fan. Our target markets are USA (US citizens are allowed to participate on our crowdsale) and Western Europe (we run localised campaigns in different countries), we also work in Russia and CIS. Though we don’t forget about China.  These days we’re focusing on the inbound marketing by providing comprehensive information that is easy to grab. Our core instruments are: 1. Our major assets are a localised regularly updated website and whitepaper 2. Long-form blogging on Steemit and Medium 3. Listing on ICO tracking sites (got listed on many of them, one of the most recent is the featuring we get for free on Cointelegraph) 4. We’re active on the most popular social networks like Twitter and Facebook, for instant messages we use Telegram chats and channels 5. We also establish presence on niche sites like Bitcointalk 6. Our code is available on Github 7. Prominent athletes vouch for Scorum (check out our YouTube) 8. We’re not active on media yet, but already got some coverage highlighting athletes support 9. You can also meet us at conferences and exhibitions, we also organize and speak at educational events and workshops 10. We offer a referral program, that allows participants to get Scorum Coins for free — 5% of each attracted purchase goes to the affiliate.   As we get closer to the crowdsale, we'll be intensifying our efforts to ensure massive awareness about it among our target audience.  Since our blogging platform and statistical center are already in the final stages of development, Scorum will be ready for a rapid rollout of the platform post-crowdsale. By that point, our major marketing push will center on the 2018 FIFA World Cup since it's a huge international event and a great chance for early Scorum users to publish content that will get world-wide attention. Writers on our platform will have a vested interest in marketing their own content as well since they are getting crypto rewards for it, so this will snowball in everyone's favor."

The Problem Each month 1 billion sports fans generate 8.5 billion visits to a variety of sports media sources, creating a huge income for them. For far too long, these fans have watched from the sidelines; spending their hard-earned cash to support their home clubs, teams, and athletes. The current sports media industry has no interest in rewarding these fans and fails to provide innovative coverage for the modern world.   Our Solution We set out to unite the passionate fans of sports around the world into a bold digital media platform where active participants are rewarded for their engagement. A community that will drive innovative event coverage, reporting, and interaction between avid fans around the world. To achieve this, we designed the following key services:  ●  The blogging platform where both content creation and curation will be rewarded through a fair and transparent economic model. Released from the constraints of the publishing industry, writers will have access to innovative data analysis, a suite of editorial tools tailored to sports content, and a built-in photo database. ●  The statistical centers will drive sports data crunching to the next level. Not only can fans browse and dig into stats about their favorite athletes or teams, writers can utilize the centers using Microsoft’s Business Intelligence tools to embed interactive infographics into their publications. Live event streaming, tickets, and other sporting goods will also be available as a part of partnership programs. ●  The commission-free betting exchange allows users to quickly place bets against each other using our cryptocurrency. Integrated with Scorum users’ wallets and coupled with in-depth statistical analysis, sports fans’ venturing into the world of betting has never been easier.    Watch the Scorum Explainer Video   Economic Model Fundamentals Our economic model is based on three fundamental principles: ●  Scorum Coins (SCR) cryptocurrency and platform ecosystem need to be supported by the real economy. ●  All platform participants must be rewarded within the system. ●  These rewards have to be distributed in a fair and transparent manner moderated by the user community.  Scorum plans to derive income from three reliable sources: internal ads, partner programs and a photo database. We intend to use this income to keep improving the platform, reward active Scorum users and donate a portion of this income to charity.      Tokens We Introduce To ensure proper functioning of the Scorum economy, we are issuing the Scorum Coins (SCR) cryptocurrency and the Scorum Power (SP) internal token.                    ●  Scorum Coin (SCR) tokens is a liquid cryptocurrency which can be bought or sold at cryptocurrency exchanges or transferred to other users. These tokens will be available for purchase during the Token Crowdsale.                   ●  Scorum Power (SP) is an internal token that needed to enable technical interactions between the system’s users. It is possible to exchange SP into SCR in equal shares (1:1 ratio) within 12 months (this time frame can later be changed by the delegates). This measure is aimed at protecting token holders’ interests.   Scorum Coins (SCR) CROWDSALE SET FOR January 14, 2018 Tokens Crowdsale will go in the following stages:  1. The first 1.6 million SCR is available now during our presale at a 50% discount from nominal value (1 USD) !!!LIVE NOW!!! SOLD OUT!! 2. The following 2 million SCR will be sold at a 25% discount. 3. After that, 3 million SCR will be available at a 10% discount. 4. The 12 million SCR left after these stages will be sold at nominal value.     18.6M for purchase at the crowdsale, after which any unsold SCR will be set aside as Scorum Power Tokens for further project development, 930K will go to the Affiliate Program (the unused SCR Tokens will be burned), and 470K will be distributed among the project team.      People Behind the Product We have hand-picked a talented team of nearly 30 industry professionals who are working hard to develop and constantly improve Scorum. Our leadership brings together strong industry experience and knowledge of game theory, journalism, design and implementation of advanced technology. Our advisory board includes the representatives of a successful IT company, a legal guidance from a seasoned San Francisco-based attorney who specializes in launching start-ups in the blockchain industry, and prominent athletes. The full team and advisors can be found here.  Backed up by Athletes We’ve teamed up with NBA star Timofey Mozgov, Olympic Champion Alexandra Patskevich, and other top athletes across major sports to bring their experience and professional insight to Scorum.     Mainstream Appeal The potential Scorum audience is estimated at one billion people worldwide, roughly the number of people who regularly interact with digital sports media currently fragmented among the many traditional platforms. Scorum’s transparent and fair reward system, data driven sports coverage features, and integrated commission free betting exchange will give active sports fans an all-inclusive way to engage with like-minded fans around the globe.
